member.summary: Gets the project file that raised the event.

member.summary: Gets the target names that are being built in the project.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine
member.summary: Provides a way for task authors to use a subset of the functionality of the MSBuild engine.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine.BuildProjectFile(System.String,System.String[],System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)
member.summary: Initiates a build of a project file. If the build is successful, the outputs, if any, of the specified targets are returned.
member.returns: true if the build was successful; otherwise, false.
member.param: The name of the project file to build.
The outputs of each specified target.
The names of the target in the project to build. Separate multiple targets with a semicolon (;).
An of additional global properties to apply to the project. The key and value must be String data types.

member.summary: Raises a custom event to all registered loggers.

member.summary: Raises a warning event to all registered loggers.
member.param: The event data.

member.returns: The line number of the task node within the project file that called it.

member.returns: The full path to the project file that contained the call to this task.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource
member.summary: Defines the events raised by the build engine. Loggers receive an object implementing this interface in their method and use it to subscribe to the events they are interested in receiving.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.AnyEventRaised
member.summary: Occurs when a build raises any other type of build event.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.BuildFinished
member.summary: Occurs when a build finishes.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.BuildStarted
member.summary: Occurs when a build starts.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.CustomEventRaised
member.summary: Occurs when a build raises a custom event.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ErrorRaised
member.summary: Occurs when a build raises an error.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.MessageRaised
member.summary: Occurs when a build raises a message.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ProjectFinished
member.summary: Occurs when a project finishes building.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.ProjectStarted
member.summary: Occurs when a project starts building.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.StatusEventRaised
member.summary: Occurs when a build raises a status event.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TargetFinished
member.summary: Occurs when a target finishes building.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TargetStarted
member.summary: Occurs when a target starts building.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TaskFinished
member.summary: Occurs when a task completes execution.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TaskStarted
member.summary: Occurs when a task begins execution.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.WarningRaised
member.summary: Occurs when a build raises a warning.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger
member.summary: Defines an MSBuild logger, which subscribes to build system events.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger.Initialize(Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource)
member.summary: Subscribes loggers to specific events. This method is called when the logger is registered with the build engine, before any events are raised.
member.param: The events available to loggers.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger.Shutdown
member.summary: Releases the resources allocated to the logger at the time of initialization or during the build. This method is called when the logger is unregistered from the engine, after all events are raised. A host of MSBuild typically unregisters loggers immediately before quitting.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger.Parameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the user-defined parameters of the logger.
member.returns: The logger parameters.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger.Verbosity
member.summary: Gets or sets the level of detail to show in the event log.
member.returns: One of the enumeration values. The default is .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask
member.summary: Defines a task, which is a unit of executable code used by MSBuild to perform build operations.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask.Execute
member.summary: Executes a task.
member.returns: true if the task executed successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask.BuildEngine
member.summary: Gets or sets the build engine associated with the task.
member.returns: The build engine associated with the task.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask.HostObject
member.summary: Gets or sets any host object that is associated with the task.
member.returns: The host object associated with the task.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskHost
member.summary: Passes host objects from an integrated development environment (IDE) to individual tasks.

The exception that is the cause of the current excpetion. If the innerException parameter is not a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the values specified.

The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

The exception that is the cause of the current excpetion. If the innerException parameter is not a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity
member.summary: Specifies the available verbosity levels of a .

member.name: F:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity.Detailed
member.summary: Minimal verbosity, which displays errors, warnings, messages with values of or , all status events, and a build summary.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity.Diagnostic
member.summary: Diagnostic verbosity, which displays all errors, warnings, messages, status events, and a build summary.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity.Minimal
member.summary: Minimal verbosity, which displays errors, warnings, messages with values of , and a build summary.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity.Normal
member.summary: Normal verbosity, which displays errors, warnings, messages with values of , some status events, and a build summary.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity.Quiet
member.summary: Quiet verbosity, which displays a build summary.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance
member.summary: Specifies constants that define the importance of a build message.

member.summary: A low importance message.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Build.Framework.MessageImportance.Normal
member.summary: A normal importance message.
